text:
Well, we made it to Hong Kong and tonight
we're going to be taking a fun tour around

the harbor where we're going to see some amazing
views of the Hong Kong skyline.
I've got my glass of wine.
White wine and I'm ready to enjoy the views.

Every night here in Hong Kong there is a Symphony
of Lights show that starts at eight o'clock

All of the buildings light up and there is
these lasers that are shooting off and music.
We had a great time on the Aqua Luna.

It was awesome to see all of the different
sights and the buildings all lit up with the

light show and we got to enjoy that with a
nice glass of wine.

It was my first time in Hong Kong and I thought
the views were unbeatable so I definitely
recommend it if you're in the city.
